mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource_pool (id, physical_cluster_id, name, namespace, gpu_slots, cpu_cores, memory_gib, volcano_queue_name, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{physicalClusterId}, #{name}, #{namespace}, #{gpuSlots}, #{cpuCores}, #{memoryGiB}, #{volcanoQueueName}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE resource_pool SET name = #{name}, gpu_slots = #{gpuSlots}, cpu_cores = #{cpuCores}, memory_gib = #{memoryGiB}, volcano_queue_name = #{volcanoQueueName}, status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM resource_pool ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM resource_pool WHERE physical_cluster_id = #{physicalClusterId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
